sbp.observation module¶

Satellite observation messages from the Piksi.

class sbp.observation.CarrierPhase(payload)[source]¶

Bases: object

CarrierPhase.

Carrier phase measurement in cycles represented as a 40-bit

fixed point number with Q32.8 layout, i.e. 32-bits of whole cycles and 8-bits of fractional cycles.

i : int
Carrier phase whole cycles
f : int
Carrier phase fractional part
from_binary(d)[source]¶
to_binary()[source]¶
class sbp.observation.MsgBasePos(sbp=None, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: sbp.SBP

SBP class for message MSG_BASE_POS (0x0044).

You can have MSG_BASE_POS inherent its fields directly from an inherited SBP object, or construct it inline using a dict of its fields.

This may be the position as reported by the base station itself or the

position obtained from doing a single point solution using the base station observations.

sbp : SBP
SBP parent object to inherit from.
lat : double
Latitude
lon : double
Longitude
height : double
Height
from_binary(d)[source]¶

Given a binary payload d, update the appropriate payload fields of the message.

Given a JSON-encoded message, build an object.

to_binary()[source]¶

Produce a framed/packed SBP message.

to_json()[source]¶

Produce a JSON-encoded SBP message.

class sbp.observation.MsgObs(sbp=None, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: sbp.SBP

SBP class for message MSG_OBS (0x0045).

You can have MSG_OBS inherent its fields directly from an inherited SBP object, or construct it inline using a dict of its fields.

The GPS observations message reports all the pseudo range and

carrier phase observations for the satellites being tracked by the Piksi.

sbp : SBP
SBP parent object to inherit from.
header : ObservationHeader
Header of a GPS observation message
obs : array
Pseudorange and carrier phase observation for a

satellite being tracked

from_binary(d)[source]¶

class sbp.observation.ObsGPSTime(payload)[source]¶

Bases: object

ObsGPSTime.

A wire-appropriate GPS time, defined as the number of

milliseconds since beginning of the week on the Saturday/Sunday transition.

tow : int
Milliseconds since start of GPS week
wn : int
GPS week number
from_binary(d)[source]¶
to_binary()[source]¶
class sbp.observation.ObservationHeader(payload)[source]¶

Bases: object

ObservationHeader.

Header of a GPS observation message.

t : ObsGPSTime
GPS time of this observation
n_obs : int
Total number of observations. First nibble is the size

of the sequence (n), second nibble is the zero-indexed counter (ith packet of n)

from_binary(d)[source]¶
to_binary()[source]¶
class sbp.observation.PackedObsContent(payload)[source]¶

Bases: object

PackedObsContent.

Pseudorange and carrier phase observation for a satellite being

tracked.

P : int
Pseudorange observation
L : CarrierPhase
Carrier phase observation
cn0 : int
Carrier-to-Noise density
lock : int
Lock indicator. This value changes whenever a satellite

signal has lost and regained lock, indicating that the carrier phase ambiguity may have changed. There is no significance to the value of the lock indicator

prn : int
PRN identifier of the satellite signal
